title: AutoHotKey

embed.description: Free keyboard macro program. Supports hotkeys for keyboard, mouse, and joystick. Can expand abbreviations as you type them (AutoText).

body:
I need some one from riot confirm that i cant be banned for using AHK to disable my enter chat so i cant write in game.


    #ifwinactive League of Legends (TM) Client

    *Enter::return

    *NumpadEnter::return
 
Can you guys tell me is  there some one who using this trick for not being toxic in game ?

replies.body: Yeeeaaaaa I can definitely respect this line of thinking!! But this has got a whole mess of other bad ways it could be used as well y'know? I would probably stay clear of using this in League.

Riot subscribes to the belief that so long as one keypress = one action you are okay. Basically, so long as you aren't using one key to simulate or mimic multiple keypresses/independent actions, you are generally acceptable. Riot doesn't care what key you press so long as you're only gaining one action from that keypress.

Considering you're actually *decreasing* this to "one keypress = zero actions", you *should* be fine. That being said, third party programs are always at your own risk.
